name: Thyroid Profile
description: Includes T3, T4, and TSH to evaluate thyroid gland function.

name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
description: Measures red blood cells, white blood cells, hemoglobin, and platelets.

name: Lipid Profile
description: Assesses cholesterol levels including HDL, LDL, and triglycerides.

name: Liver Function Test (LFT)
description: Evaluates liver health through enzymes, proteins, and bilirubin levels.

name: Kidney Function Test (KFT)
description: Measures creatinine, urea, and electrolytes to assess kidney function.

name: Blood Glucose (Fasting)
description: Measures fasting blood sugar levels to screen for diabetes.

name: HbA1c
description: Assesses average blood sugar levels over the past 2-3 months.

name: Urine Routine & Microscopy
description: Analyzes urine for infections, crystals, and other abnormalities.

name: Vitamin D (25-Hydroxy)
description: Measures vitamin D levels to assess bone health.

name: Iron Studies
description: Evaluates iron levels, ferritin, and total iron-binding capacity.

name: Hemoglobin Electrophoresis
description: Detects abnormal hemoglobin variants for thalassemia or sickle cell disease.

name: C-Reactive Protein (CRP)
description: Measures inflammation levels in the body.

name: Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (APTT)
description: Evaluates intrinsic and common coagulation pathways.

name: Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR)
description: Measures inflammation by red blood cell settling rate.

name: Glucose Tolerance Test (GTT)
description: Assesses how the body processes sugar over time.

name: Electrolyte Panel
description: Measures sodium, potassium, chloride, and bicarbonate levels.

name: Amylase
description: Evaluates pancreatic function through enzyme levels.

name: Lipase
description: Assesses pancreatic health via enzyme activity.

name: Aspartate Aminotransferase (AST)
description: Evaluates liver and heart muscle damage.

name: Total Bilirubin
description: Measures bilirubin levels to assess liver function.

name: Direct Bilirubin
description: Evaluates conjugated bilirubin in liver function.

name: Gamma-Glutamyl Transferase (GGT)
description: Assesses liver and bile duct health.

name: A/G Ratio
description: Assesses the ratio of albumin to globulin.

name: Creatinine
description: Measures kidney function via waste product levels.

name: Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN)
description: Assesses kidney function through urea levels.

name: Uric Acid
description: Measures purine metabolism and gout risk.

name: Calcium
description: Evaluates bone health and calcium metabolism.

name: Magnesium
description: Measures magnesium levels for muscle and nerve function.

name: Chloride
description: Measures chloride levels for acid-base balance.

name: Blood Culture
description: Identifies bacteria or fungi in blood.

name: FISH (Down Syndrome)
description: Fluorescence in situ hybridization for Down syndrome.

name: BRCA1/2 Mutation Analysis
description: Screens for breast cancer genetic mutations.

name: KRAS Mutation Test
description: Detects KRAS gene mutations for cancer therapy.

name: Progesterone
description: Measures hormone levels for reproductive health.

name: Lactic Acid
description: Measures lactic acid levels for metabolic health.

name: Alpha-Fetoprotein (AFP)
description: Screens for liver cancer or fetal abnormalities.

name: Zinc (Serum)
description: Assesses zinc levels for immune health.

name: Copper (Serum)
description: Measures copper levels for metabolic health.

name: Thyroglobulin
description: Evaluates thyroid function and cancer risk.

name: Flow Cytometry
description: Analyzes cell populations in blood or bone marrow.

name: Immunohistochemistry (IHC)
description: Stains tissue to identify cell types.

name: Alpha-1 Antitrypsin
description: Measures AAT levels for lung and liver health.

name: Alpha-L-Iduronidase
description: Screens for Hurler syndrome enzyme activity.

name: Acylcarnitine Profile
description: Screens for fatty acid oxidation disorders.

name: Pyruvate
description: Measures pyruvate levels for metabolic health.

name: Ammonia
description: Evaluates liver function and urea cycle.

name: Gamma-Glutamyl Transferase (GGT) Isoenzymes
description: Assesses specific bile duct enzyme forms.

name: Anti-GAD65 Antibody
description: Screens for stiff-person syndrome or diabetes.

name: Anti-Zasp Antibody
description: Assesses Z-band alternatively spliced PDZ-motif protein.
